casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
John Edward BUTLER. No. 629P01-4. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 15, 2015. John Edward Butler, for Butler, John Edward. Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, for State of N.C. L. Johnson Britt, III, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 21st of September 2015 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of December 2015."
